description: SAP Netweaver Application Server Java (Applications based on WebDynpro Java) versions 7.00, 7.10, 7.11, 7.20, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, allow an attacker to redirect users to a malicious site due to Reverse Tabnabbing vulnerabilities.
